text: Motya is a genus of moths of the family Nolidae. The genus was erected by Francis Walker in 1859. ==Species== *Motya abseuzalis Walker, 1859 Florida, Antilles to Brazil *Motya arcuata (Schaus, 1910) Costa Rica *Motya flotsama (Dyar, 1914) Panama *Motya griselda (Dyar, 1914) Mexico, Panama, Venezuela *Motya mythias (Schaus, 1921) Guatemala *Motya siopera (Dyar, 1914) Panama, Mexico ==References== Category:Chloephorinae
title: Motya (moth)
